Title: Defections to APC driven by fear of losing 2027 elections — Onuoha
Summary: Defections to APC driven by fear of losing in 2027 general elections — Onuoha . The ongoing defections by politicians to the ruling APC is driven by fears of losing . Professor Onuoh said the defections are driven by a fear of winning in the 2027 elections .

Title: ICAN UK chair reveals over 550 members in updated database
Summary: ICAN UK chair reveals over 550 members in updated database . Pastor Ojo reveals that ICAN, UK and District Society now has more than 550 members .

Title: Guirassy lifts Dortmund past Augsburg ahead of Man City clash
Summary: Borussia Dortmund beat Augsburg 1-0 in a warm-up friendly . Serhou Guirassy scored the only goal of the game in the first half . The win comes ahead of a clash with Manchester City at the Etihad Stadium .

Title: US tariffs on heavy trucks, buses take effect
Summary: New US tariffs on medium- and heavy-duty truck imports began Saturday . Partial exemptions for vehicles under a North America trade deal are granted .

Title: Nneamaka Nwadei: Shaping Africa’s creative future and innovation
Summary: In a world where many chase applause, Nneamaka Nwadei chases impact . The performing artiste, producer, and media entrepreneur is bridging the gap between creativity, innovation, and purpose .

Title: FCTA has met 90% of resident doctors’ demands – Official
Summary: FCTA says it has met 90 per cent of the demands made by resident doctors in its workforce . The Federal Capital Territory Administration (FCTA) is yet to implement the demands pending full implementation .

Title: Vieira leaves troubled Genoa
Summary:
Genoa has been entrusted on an interim basis to Roberto Murgita, assisted by (former Genoa player) Domenico Criscito

Title: FCT Court jails teenage teacher for life over defilement of 9-year-old
Summary: FCT Court jails teenage teacher for life over defilement of 9-year-old . NAPTIP described the judgment as another major breakthrough in the fight against sexual violence in Nigeria .

Title: Canada PM says Xi talks ‘turning point’, apologises to Trump
Summary: Canadian premier Mark Carney called his talks with China's leader Xi Jinping a "turning point" in restoring their battered ties . Carney said he raised tricky topics with Beijing like foreign interference .

Title: Army crushes terror cells, rescues 17 kidnap victims, nabs 20 suspects
Summary: Army crushes terror cells, rescues 17 kidnap victims, nabs 20 suspects . Operations were conducted simultaneously across Northeast, Northwest, North Central and South-South regions .

Title: Seadogs offers free treatment to Akwa Ibom residents
Summary: The National Association of Seadogs has offered free medical treatment to residents of Afaha Atai community in Ibesikpo Asutan Local Government Area of Akwa Ibom State . Title: Veteran actress Peju Ogunmola returns to screen after son’s death
Summary: Yoruba Nollywood actress, Peju Ogunmola, has announced her return to acting . The respected actress lost her son, Ayomikun, prompting an outpouring of grief and tributes from colleagues across the film industry . Title: Troops rescue 17, arrest 20 in nationwide raids
Summary: Nigerian Army says its troops have intensified operations against terrorists and criminal elements across the country, rescuing 17 kidnapped victims, arresting 20 suspects, and neutralising two terrorists in the last 48 hours . Title: Satellite images suggest mass killings in Sudan's El-Fasher
Summary: UN officials warned on October 30 that "large-scale atrocities" were underway in Sudan's Kordofan region as paramilitary forces advanced . Title: Egypt set to open grand museum in lavish ceremony
Summary: Grand Egyptian Museum is a long-awaited, billion-dollar showcase of pharaonic grandeur that Egypt hopes will help revive tourism and boost its troubled economy .
